column2: "Mma nnsuro; na menye wo nam: medze w'asefo befi boka aba

Fa ma; na pomu afamu dɛ

column2: "Hom mfa ɔman a wɔwɔ enyiwa naaso wɔyɛ efurafo

na nyimpa nyina nhyia mu: hɔn mu woana botum ada iyi edzi

Ao Jakob; na mbom mo ho afon wo

column2: "Emmfaa wo hyew afɔr nguan no mmbrɛɛ me; eso emmfaa w'afɔrbɔdze nndzii me nyi. Memmaa emmfaa w'edziban afɔr nnsoom me
column3: eso memmaa emmberɛe wɔ nduhuam."

column2: "Ɔwo emmfaa sika nntɔɔ ahwer mmaa me
column3: eso emmaa w'afɔrbɔ seradze mmee me: mbom edze wo bɔn atseetsee me
column4: edze w'emumuyɛ ama maberɛ."

column3: emi marankasa
column4: nye nyia ɔpepa wo mbrato wɔ mankasa me ntsi; na merennkaa wo bɔn."

column2: "Kaakaa me ɛ; ma yenyi atsɛn: ka w'asɛm
column3: ama eedzi bem."

column2: "W'egya a odzi kan no yɛɛ bɔn
column3: na wo ntamugyinafo ato mbra etsia me."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi megu krɔnkrɔnbea mbapɔmba no ho fi
column3: na meyi Jakob ama ɔsɛɛ kɛse
column4: na Israel ama asesardze."
